#IDE Description page.

= IDE Features =
IDE is a shortcut for Integrated Developing Environment, in other words, it provides more than script editor for writing the script. In our IDE, MonkeyStudio IDE, we provide different languages support^(1)^, script debugging^(2)^, syntax highlighting, building tools, project interfaces, built-in IRC client & so much more. discover our IDE ;)<br />
